properties.title: Pumptrack Arosa
properties.abstract: The highest tarmac pump track in the world is currently located right next to the «Ochsenbühl» playground and the sports ground - «small but nice» suits the description best…
properties.description:
The pump track Arosa is a small gem among all pump tracks – in addition to the tarmac tracks there are two flexible obstacles to enlarge the pump track by two turns and to maximize the riding pleasure.

Located right next to the playground, it is a perfect spot for small and big kids. Advanced bikers can practice jumps while the less trained children can improve their skills while taking steep turns. Thanks to the tarmac the track dries quickly after rain.

Note: During the big events on the sports ground «Ochsenbühl» only a part of the pump track will be accessible as the obstacles will be removed!
